patterns.name: agentdocs
patterns.description: Browse Agent Kit documentation directly in terminal. Use for quick access to architecture, skills, workflows, and reference docs.

patterns.name: browser
patterns.description: Interactive browser automation with agent-browser. Open pages, click elements, fill forms, take screenshots. Use for testing UI, automating tasks, or debugging visual issues.

patterns.name: budget
patterns.description: Track and report customer kontingent usage from Productive.io. Monitor budget consumption and warn on low kontingent.

patterns.name: checkout-project
patterns.description: Clone an existing project from GitHub into the projects folder. Use when starting work on an existing downstream project.

patterns.name: clone-skill
patterns.description: Clone skills from central repository or import from clipboard. Use to add proven patterns to your project.

patterns.name: commit
patterns.description: Create a well-formatted git commit with PROJECT-STATUS.md updates. Use after completing implementation.

patterns.name: create-prd
patterns.description: Create a Product Requirements Document from conversation. Use when starting a new project or defining product requirements.

patterns.name: deploy
patterns.description: Deploy project to LUCIDLABS-HQ. Use /deploy for full deployment, /deploy setup for file generation, /deploy status for health checks, /deploy logs for container logs.

patterns.name: design-system-guard
patterns.description: Validate UI screens against Lucid Labs design system rules. Use after implementing UI components to verify adherence to brand colors, typography, layout patterns, and service board logic.

patterns.name: execute
patterns.description: Execute an implementation plan step by step. Use after planning is complete.

patterns.name: init-project
patterns.description: Initialize a new project from Agent Kit boilerplate. Use when creating a new downstream project.

patterns.name: linear
patterns.description: Linear project management integration. Use for creating issues, updating status, and syncing work with Linear board.

patterns.name: llm-evaluate
patterns.description: Evaluate LLM models for cost/performance ratio. Fetches current pricing and recommends optimal model for your use case. Use during project init or when optimizing costs.

patterns.name: mastra-mcp
patterns.description: Configure Mastra as MCP Server to expose agents and tools via Model Context Protocol. Enables Claude Desktop and other MCP clients to use Mastra tools.

patterns.name: meeting-decisions
patterns.description: Extract AIDD decisions from tldv.io meeting transcripts and notes. Analyzes transcripts to propose proceed/pivot/drop/iterate decisions.

patterns.name: mistral
patterns.description: Setup Mistral AI integration for a project. Use for EU-friendly, fast, cost-effective LLM access with PDF/document analysis.

patterns.name: n8n-workflow
patterns.description: Generate and manage n8n workflows for AI agents. Creates automation workflows that complement Mastra agents.

patterns.name: notion-publish
patterns.description: Publish markdown documents to Notion as private pages. Use for sharing specs, docs, or session outputs.

patterns.name: plan-feature
patterns.description: Create comprehensive feature implementation plan with deep codebase analysis. Use before implementing any feature.

patterns.name: pr
patterns.description: Create a feature branch, commit changes, push, and open a Pull Request. The standard way to ship changes. Use after implementation is complete.

patterns.name: pre-production
patterns.description: Pre-Production Security & Quality Check with Strix AI. Use BEFORE deploying to production to catch vulnerabilities and issues.

patterns.name: prime
patterns.description: Load project context and show current status. Use at the start of a session or when context is needed.

patterns.name: productizer
patterns.description: Bridge between Linear (execution) and Productive.io (customer value). Translates internal work into customer-facing service reports.

patterns.name: promote
patterns.description: Promote generic patterns from this project back to the upstream agent-kit. Use when you have reusable patterns to share.

patterns.name: promptfoo
patterns.description: LLM evaluation and self-learning prompts. Test, compare, and improve prompts systematically. Red-teaming and vulnerability scanning.

patterns.name: publish-skill
patterns.description: Publish local skills to central repository for team sharing. Use when you've developed a useful pattern others should have.

patterns.name: screenshot
patterns.description: Take visual verification screenshots using agent-browser. Use for UI verification.

patterns.name: session-end
patterns.description: End development session cleanly. Updates Linear tickets, checks Git compliance, ensures clean state for next session.

patterns.name: start
patterns.description: Entry point for Agent Kit. Use this when starting a session in the template repository to create or open a project.

patterns.name: sync
patterns.description: Sync updates from upstream agent-kit to this downstream project. Use when the template has new skills or patterns.

patterns.name: test
patterns.description: Run tests with coverage report and gap analysis. MANDATORY before /commit and PR creation. Use after implementation or during validation.

patterns.name: test-setup
patterns.description: Initialize testing infrastructure for a project. Syncs Vitest + Playwright configs from upstream.

patterns.name: time-report
patterns.description: Cross-project time report. Aggregates all session data from ~/.claude-time/sessions/. Use to see how much time was spent across all projects.

patterns.name: update-readme
patterns.description: Update README with current project status and features. Use after completing features.

patterns.name: visual-verify
patterns.description: Visual UI verification with agent-browser. Use after implementing UI components to take screenshots, verify interactions, and self-check your work. FASTER than E2E tests.

patterns.name: convex-helpers
patterns.description: convex-helpers utility

patterns.name: types
patterns.description: types utility

patterns.name: utils
patterns.description: utils utility
